name: Introduction to Latin Literature
description: This course provides an introduction to the genre of Latin Literature, including discussing the different authors, works, and themes.

name: Latin Grammar
description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of Latin grammar, including verb conjugation, noun declension, and more.

name: Classical Mythology
description: This course provides a comprehensive overview of Classical Mythology, including the gods and goddesses, major themes, and common motifs in Latin literature.

name: Virgil's Aeneid
description: This course focuses on the epic poem Aeneid by Virgil, discussing its major plot points, characters, and themes.

name: Ovid's Metamorphoses
description: This course focuses on the epic poem Metamorphoses by Ovid, discussing its major plot points, characters, and themes.

name: Cicero's Orations
description: This course focuses on the orations of Cicero, discussing their major topics, themes, and rhetoric.
